mapper.select: SELECT ori.order_no, ori.qty, oui.qty AS outitem_qty, i.item_nm, i.item_cd, dbo.FN_CURRENT_STOCK(ori.item_cd) AS stock, ou.cust_emp, ou.remark, order_qty FROM TB_ORDER_ITEM AS ori JOIN TB_ITEMMST AS i ON ori.item_cd = i.item_cd JOIN TB_ORDER AS ord ON ori.ORDER_NO = ord.ORDER_NO JOIN TB_OUTITEM AS ou ON ori.ORDER_NO = ou.ORDER_NO JOIN ( SELECT oui.ORDER_NO, oui.ITEM_CD, SUM(oui.qty) AS qty FROM TB_OUTITEM AS ou JOIN TB_OUTITEM_ITEM AS oui ON ou.OUTITEM_NO = oui.OUTITEM_NO WHERE ou.outitem_delete_chk = 0 AND ou.outitem_no = #{outitem_no} GROUP BY oui.ORDER_NO, oui.ITEM_CD ) AS oui ON ori.ORDER_NO = oui.ORDER_NO AND ori.ITEM_CD = oui.ITEM_CD JOIN ( SELECT o.ORDER_NO, o.ITEM_CD, SUM(o.qty) AS order_qty FROM TB_OUTITEM_ITEM o JOIN TB_OUTITEM i ON o.outitem_no = i.outitem_no WHERE o.ORDER_NO = #{order_no} AND i.outitem_delete_chk = 0 GROUP BY o.ORDER_NO, o.ITEM_CD ) AS order_qty ON ori.ORDER_NO = order_qty.ORDER_NO AND ori.ITEM_CD = order_qty.ITEM_CD WHERE ou.outitem_no = #{outitem_no} AND ori.ORDER_NO = #{order_no} AND ou.outitem_delete_chk = 0

SELECT ori.order_no, ori.item_cd, ori.qty as old_order_qty, i.item_nm, dbo.FN_CURRENT_STOCK(ori.item_cd) AS stock, oi.old_qty AS old_qty, outitem_sum_qty_table.outitem_sum_qty AS outitem_sum_qty FROM TB_ORDER_ITEM AS ori JOIN TB_ITEMMST AS i ON ori.item_cd = i.item_cd JOIN TB_ORDER AS ord ON ori.ORDER_NO = ord.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oi.item_cd, SUM(oi.qty) AS old_qty FROM TB_OUTITEM_ITEM AS oi JOIN TB_OUTITEM AS o ON oi.outitem_no = o.outitem_no WHERE o.outitem_delete_chk = 0 AND o.outitem_no = #{outitem_no} GROUP BY oi.item_cd ) AS oi ON ori.item_cd = oi.item_cd JOIN ( SELECT ti.order_no, COALESCE(ti.item_cd, oi.item_cd) AS item_cd, oi.outitem_sum_qty FROM (SELECT oi.item_cd, SUM(oi.qty) AS outitem_sum_qty FROM tb_outitem_item oi JOIN tb_outitem oo ON oi.outitem_no = oo.outitem_no join tb_order ord on oi.order_no=ord.order_no WHERE oo.outitem_delete_chk = 0 and oi.order_no=#{order_no}
GROUP BY oi.item_cd) AS oi RIGHT JOIN (SELECT o.order_no, ti.item_cd FROM tb_order_item ti JOIN tb_order o ON ti.order_no = o.order_no WHERE ti.order_no = #{order_no} ) AS ti ON oi.item_cd = ti.item_cd ) AS outitem_sum_qty_table ON ori.ORDER_NO = outitem_sum_qty_table.ORDER_NO AND ori.ITEM_CD = outitem_sum_qty_table.ITEM_CD WHERE ori.ORDER_NO = #{order_no}
